ooC: Jeremy's going to me: *hint* *hint* *hint* =P

--- Drag Strip / Dead-End / Astroblast / Switchblade / 
Rippersnapper ---

Astroblast flies in, transforms, and lands on the island. He waits for 
Dead-End and Drag Strip

Dead-End and Drag Strip come out of the cloud cover, and streak 
down to land. Drag Strip lands and looks at the assembled 
Decepticons, "Arrright! So where's this spaceship we needa move? 
I wanna move it now, and get the slag out of here! Wildrider, after 
this, we can go scare the crap out of animals in the forest." He 
makes gear shifting noises and motions as he pretends to run 
down a deer. Stopping, he rubs his hands in anticipation. Dead-
End sighs and mutters, "One of these days, the animals are going 
to cause him to get wasted... Heh." Both wait for the other 
Terrorcons to arrive.

Rippersnapper doesn't dissapoint the Stunticons, "What 
Rippersnapper supposed do?" He queries Astroblast.

Astroblast, noting that all of the group have arrived, gives 
Rippersnapper a brief summary, not wanting to confuse the mostly 
stupid bot, "We will move a ship." He walks away from the bot, 
ignoring any further questions. "Motormaster," He says as he 
approaches, "Have all of the Terrorcons arrived?" He scans the 
bots present, and notices all of the Stunticons, though the 
Terrorcons seem to be lacking a member or two.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Switchblade has been in his makeshift lab for a while, cleaning up 
several projects. He just finished making three Nightstrike missiles 
for one of his cohorts. "There," He says to himself, now to findout if 
Megatron has anything else for me to do..." He opens a commlink 
to Megatron, "Megs what's going on up there? You got something 
for me to do 'cause I'm gettin bored here." He sends a quick 
message to Nightstrike, "Nightstrike, your missiles are ready. Pick 
them up whenever." Switchblade grabs his laser welders, puts 
them away, and starts walking up through the twisting dark 
hallways of the cruiser called the Dark Avian.

On 17 Jul 2001, at 18:26, robertdahl wrote:

> OOC: Okay guys, from now on Speedbreaker is Breakdown, (thanks
> KSLAWDOGG
> 
> 
> Sinnertwin finally parted through some clouds, his arms totally
> outstreched, he looked down and could see three Decepticons, as he
> flew towards them.
> 
> Motormaster turned towards Cyclonus. "Well, aparently we need Stratus
> and Astrotrain. Plus if my Stunticons didnt get lost." he said
> aggressivly, as he looked up to the sky. Behind him Sinnertwin landed,
> and Transformed into his creature mode. He began to sniff the area,
> and was moving towards a group of trees.
> ______________________________________________________________________
> 
> Further off in the distance, two figueres parted between some clouds.
> "Are we even going in the right direction?" Breakdown asked worridly. 
> 
> "Sure we are." Wildrider said, more ignoring his fellow Stunticon.
> They flew gracefully close to the ocean, water splashing apon their
> metalic forms. Breakdown looked around him.
> 
> "Are Drag-Strip and Dead End still behind us?" he asked. 
> 
> Wildrider didnt even bother to look. "Sure they are." as they rounded
> another large rock.
